page.title: 13NOW AND THEN
page.content: {GALA DAY }For years our Gala Day has been celebrated annually in early summer,the exact day depending on the tides because the Seton Queen sails by fishing boat from Cockenzie Harbour to Port Seton Harbour.Gala characters are on lorries and are driven to the local park where the Crowning Ceremony takes place. {THE BOX MEETING}linked with a fishermens walk began about 1870.Fishermen's subscriptions went into a box with two locks and if at any time some one was hurt or ill some assistance from the box would help them.After the Box Meeting an old boat was burned on the rocks by the entrance to Shore Bay The box was carried in procession by the Box Master and another Office-bearer..
